movie.title: American Pie Presents Beta House
movie.tagline: The most outrageous slice of pie!
movie.description: Erik, Ryan, and Cooze start college and pledge the Beta House fraternity, presided over by none other than legendary Dwight Stifler. But chaos ensues when a fraternity of geeks threatens to stop the debauchery and the Betas have to make a stand for their right to party.
